section.heading: Licensure of real estate organizations.
section.text: No real estate broker’s license shall be issued to any firm, franchise, partnership, association, or corporation unless the Mayor finds that:

para.text: The applicant is organized and exists pursuant to applicable District and federal laws;
Every person member, partner, trustee, or officer who is engaged in activities defined in this subsection is licensed under this subchapter;
Every employee who will render professional services holds a valid license or certificate issued by the Board; and
Every branch office is managed by a licensed real estate broker.
